xwikidoc.content: activitypub.follow.input.label=指定したユーザーをフォロー。 ### Missing: activitypub.follow.input.hint=Enter the identifier of an user to start following him/her. ### Missing: activitypub.follow.input.placeholder=@foo@domain ### Missing: activitypub.follow.button=Follow ### Missing: activitypub.follow.followRequested=The follow request has been sent. ### Missing: activitypub.follow.followNotRequested=The follow request failed. ### Missing: activitypub.follow.inprogress=The follow request is being sent… ### Missing: activitypub.follow.followYourself=You can't follow yourself. ### Missing: activitypub.follow.alreadyFollowed=You already follow this user. ### Missing: activitypub.follow.target.placeholder=Insert here the identifier(s) of user(s) ### Missing: activitypub.message.target.label=Target users of the message ### Missing: activitypub.message.target.hint=You can select your followers and/or some specific users. ### Missing: activitypub.message.target.placeholder=Insert here the identifier(s) of user(s) ### Missing: activitypub.message.content.label=Content of your message ### Missing: activitypub.message.content.hint=Type here the message you want to send. ### Missing: activitypub.message.button=Send the message ### Missing: activitypub.following.title=Following ### Missing: activitypub.following.empty=This user is not following anyone. ### Missing: activitypub.followers.title=Followers ### Missing: activitypub.followers.empty=This user does not have any follower yet. ### Missing: activitypub.user.profile.menu=ActivityPub ### Missing: activitypub.webfinger=Webfinger ### Missing: activitypub.follow.actornotfound=The user you specified cannot be found. ### Missing: activitypub.storage.needrestart=The ActivityPub storage is not ready. Please ask the administrator to restart the server to initialize it. ### Missing: activitypub.webfinger.notconfigured=The WebFinger endpoint is not configured on this server. You might want to ask your administrator to configure it in order to help using ActivityPub. ### Missing: activitypub.user.identifier=ActivityPub user identifier ### Missing: activitypub.user.identifier.tip=Use this identifier if you want to interact with this user. ### Missing: activitypub.user.identifier.copyButton=Copy the ActivityPub user identifier ### Missing: activitypub.user.identifier.copied=The identifier has been copied into your clipboard. ### Missing: activitypub.message.messageSent=Message sent. ### Missing: activitypub.message.messageError=Error when sending the message. ### Missing: activitypub.message.messageInprogress=Message is being sent… ### Missing: activitypub.shareDocument.success=Page shared successfully ### Missing:
